question: You have read about a scholarship offered by a university and wish to apply.Write a letter to the university and include the following information:the scholarship you wish to apply forsome details about yourselfyour academic suitability for the scholarshipand any other relevant information.
text: I am writing you this letter, in regard to the information published on the university website which is offering scholarships for different courses.I would like to apply for one of them which is 50% of the tuition fee for M. Tech in biotechnology.

Let me explain about myself , I am from Bhopal and I have completed my bachelor's degree in biotechnology from RKDF university year 2017-2021, where I got a goldmedal  in scoring the highest marks in all the semesters. And I had done my major project in seed germination which is also suitable for the master's degree that I am applying for. Apart from that , I participated in all the extra-curricular activities at the university.
Additionally, After graduation I did some field work as well in the greenhouse , for  reference ,I am attaching a certificate. which will make me suitable for this scholarship.
I am attaching all semester mark sheets and certificates with the scholarship form.Looking for a favourable response.

error_list.error_des: If you do not want goldmedal to be marked as misspelled in the future, you can add it to your personal dictionary.
